snippet.title: Lagnacure (PS1) - An RPG Hidden Gem
snippet.description: An obscure RPG game for the PS1 that features some of the most creative 3D Yokai monsters ever designed. Although the overworld is beautiful and represented in full 3D, but the main attraction is the battle system, that is exceptionally well done in animations and dynamic camera work... take a look!
